reviews.review: Game Of The Year.. EVERY YEAR
It's Half-Life 2.

Jak tu mieć steama i nie mieć Half-Life 2. Absolutna klasyka, gra przez wielu uważana za najlepszą grę jaka kiedykolwiek powstała. Grę przeszedłem 4 razy, z czego ostatni raz, był właśnie pierwszym na Steam. Zajęło mi to ok. 17 godz.

+ Intrygująca, świetnie poprowadzona fabuła, kontynuująca wydarzenia z pierwszej części i ogromnie rozszerzająca uniwersum.
+ W swoich czasach piękna, bardzo realistyczna grafika, która nawet po dziś dzień nieźle wygląda. Świetne animacje postaci, mimika twarzy, realistyczne refleksy wody, wyraźne, ostre tekstury.
+ Gravity gun, fizyka i wszelkie zagadki z nią związane. Fizyka ogólnie robi wrażenie nawet dzisiaj.
+ Świetna, klimatyczna ścieżka dźwiękowa, utwory muzyczne świetnie pasują do tego co się akurat dzieje na ekranie. Kiedy za pierwszym razem grałem to zdawało mi się, że w ogóle ich nie ma xd.
+ Sporo różnorodnych broni, z których każda się przydaje
+ Świetne poziomy w bardzo różnorodnych klimatach: pływanie łodką, miasto pełne zombie, partyzancka walka z małym oddziałem na ulicach miasta... każdy poziom to coś nowego. Nie ma miejsca na nudę.
+ Ogólnie świetny klimat
- Minusów oczywiście brak

Unless you have lived under a rock for the past decade plus, you know the reputation this game has.  It is truly an amazing video game experience, one every gamer should play through.  From the likable characters to the smart level design and attention to detail, this game will captivate even the most modest gamer.  You truly feel like you live in this world and are taking part in what is going on in this beautiful city.  The game play is as good as it gets when it comes to first person shooters.  A great story and superb voice acting really help the immersion as well.... so get ready and grab your gravity gun, we have some bad guys to send flyin!!!  9/10.  ***Only reason this game does not get a 10 is the lack of a map.  Not really needed but would have been nice in some cases.

Primeiro jogo que zerei na minha vida, isso lá em 2009, 5 anos após seu lançamento. Achei o jogo fantástico, gráficos incríveis, história top, boa jogabilidade e viciante. Mesmo 11 anos depois, o sentimento permanece o mesmo, Half-Life é a melhor experiência em um FPS que já tive. Tanto que fiz questão de pegar todas as conquistas, ele merece ser feito em sua totalidade. Sem mas.

I can safely say this game deserves its reputation as one of the best games of all time. 

The gameplay and graphics hold up amazing well despite being over 15 years old (the driving mechanics are really the only thing that dates it), and the story is rich, fully illuminating the horrors of an oppressive regime and how the revolution will not be easy. The characters are all amazingly well defined and you will care about every single one of them. I got emotionally attached to my army of antlions, for god's sake! 

If the first Half-Life is too outdated for you this is a good place to start instead. It's an important part of gaming history and very much worthy of being in your Steam library.
The best game of 2020 LOL :-)

In terms of the best single-player gaming experience out there, Half-Life 2 falls just slightly under Portal 2 due to it not aging quite as well. Regardless, this game is a must play for anyone who enjoys shooters, story games, adventure games with immersive worlds, or plain video games. I always recommend this game to anyone who hasn't played it before and is into video games. It's so damn good and genuinely made me feel shit while playing. Not a lot of games can do that to me. It's sick!
One of the best games ive played.

Somente agora em 2020 resolvi jogar Half-Life 2 pela primeira vez. Jogabilidade excelente, história excelente, gráficos muito bonitos, que deixam muitos jogos atuais no chão... Enfim, pacote completo. Agora eu entendo o porquê de tanta hype nesse jogo, e posso afirmar: ESSE FOI O MELHOR JOGO QUE EU JÁ JOGUEI NA MINHA VIDA. Se eu pudesse, voltava no tempo, só pra esquecer e poder jogar de novo. Não pense, apenas COMPRE E JOGUE!

Um jogo mais velho que o próprio tempo. Compre sabendo que é um jogo de 2004 com gráficos de 2014/15. Se sua maquina for no mínimo um duo core você já consegue apreciar o jogo em uma boa qualidade gráfica. Já jogou Halo? Se sua resposta for sim então eu sinto lhe informar que esse jogo é melhor. Half Life 2 está colocando o Halo Infinito (jogo do macaco) no bolço. Use fones de ouvido, é uma dica muito útil acho que para qualquer jogo no estilo fps. Em suma, é um jogo que ajuda bastante a passar o tempo só não queira passar o tempo jogando no experd (difícil) pois sua paciência não vai durar muito. :)

Even if the combat and gameplay are in my opinion inferior, the graphics and story more than make up for it. The Source Engine looks beautiful to the engine in previous games in the series. It's nice having characters that have meaning rather than generic scientists. I also love how the game is more open world than in the original. It gives me the greater sense of a long journey, and having accomplished many things since I started playing. 96%
